thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: Andy in Hawick
thread.title_full: Goldmoney.com reviewed by Andy in Hawick

author: Andy in Hawick
title: Andy in Hawick
text:
This is not for everyone and it's not a trading platform like BullionVault but it's a good way of holding gold and transferring to others as payment or whatever.
I'm still hoping that they set up a clearing account in UK so that I don't have to send internationally to Canada when I want the gold to accumulate in the London vault!
There's a limit now of 1kg Au although I haven't worked out the implications and what is actually required beyond the hoops that I've already jumped through.
